mentoringSection.youHaventMentoredAnyone:
**Functional Purpose**: Message indicating no mentoring activity
**UI Location**: Journey overview page, Mentoring section, when no tracks are mentored
**When Users See This**: When a user has not mentored any students or tracks yet
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "You haven't mentored anyone yet"
mentoringSection.tryMentoring:
**Functional Purpose**: Call to action to start mentoring
**UI Location**: Journey overview page, Mentoring section, button when no tracks are mentored
**When Users See This**: When a user has not mentored any students or tracks yet
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Try mentoring"
mentoringSection.yourMentoring:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the user's mentoring section
**UI Location**: Journey overview page, Mentoring section header
**When Users See This**: On the journey overview page, in the mentoring section
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Your mentoring"
badgesSection.aGlimpseOfBadges:
**Functional Purpose**: Introductory text for the badges collection preview
**UI Location**: Journey overview page, Badges section, header
**When Users See This**: On the journey overview page, in the badges section
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "A glimpse of your badges collection"
badgesSection.seeEntireBadgeCollection:
**Functional Purpose**: Link text to view all badges
**UI Location**: Journey overview page, Badges section, prominent link
**When Users See This**: On the journey overview page, in the badges section
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "See your entire badge collection"
orderSwitcher.sortByUnrevealedFirst:
**Functional Purpose**: Option for sorting badges with unrevealed badges appearing first
**UI Location**: Badges list page, sort dropdown menu
**When Users See This**: When interacting with the badge sorting dropdown
**Technical Context**: Used within a `SingleSelect` component. Value must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Sort by Unrevealed First"
orderSwitcher.sortByNewestFirst:
**Functional Purpose**: Option for sorting badges by their acquisition date, newest first
**UI Location**: Badges list page, sort dropdown menu
**When Users See This**: When interacting with the badge sorting dropdown
**Technical Context**: Used within a `SingleSelect` component. Value must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Sort by Newest First"
orderSwitcher.sortByOldestFirst:
**Functional Purpose**: Option for sorting badges by their acquisition date, oldest first
**UI Location**: Badges list page, sort dropdown menu
**When Users See This**: When interacting with the badge sorting dropdown
**Technical Context**: Used within a `SingleSelect` component. Value must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Sort by Oldest First"
